page.title: 06ADVENTURE IN A HOTHAM GARDEN
page.content: 'Ding dong', I opened the door. "Hello, Jenny, let's go outside" We ran down the steps. "What shall we play?" Several games were suggested, but I got bored, ran into our den and down the bank. The others followed close behind, jumped the flower bed, down to the pond, across the lawn and into the orchard. The others came up puffing and panting and we decided to plan an adventure. "Here is a big ravine and we've got to swing across" I said, "Jenny first, then Chrissie and Bev. I'll follow last" Igrabbed the swing, then helped Jenny on and she swung across. She pushed back the swing and we somehow managed to get Chrissie on! They sent back the swing and Bev. went. When we were all safely across the ravine we ran back up the garden. I love it here!
